fields.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
Order attribute specifies the order for the Income Distribution Rule.

Gift_Gift_Classification_Reference_WID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Order.description: Order attribute specifies the order for the Income Distribution Rule.
